state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled milk. -= Bedroom =- I am sorry to announce that you are now in the bedroom. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a chest drawer. You scan the room for an antique trunk, and you find an antique trunk. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. You smell an interesting smell, and follow it to a king-size bed. The king-size bed is standard. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. You think about smashing the king-size bed to bits, throwing the bits in the dump, etc, until you get bored. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
next_state: You open the antique trunk, revealing an old key. > -= Bedroom =-0/2

admissible_commands: take old key from antique trunk

next_action: take old key from antique trunk

state: You open the antique trunk, revealing an old key. > -= Bedroom =-0/2

admissible_commands: take old key from antique trunk

action: take old key from antique trunk
next_state: You take the old key from the antique trunk. > -= Bedroom =-0/3

admissible_commands: insert old key into antique trunk
put old key on king-size bed
unlock wooden door with old key

next_action: unlock wooden door with old key

next_state: -= Kitchen =- Of every kitchen you could have sauntered into, you had to walk into an ordinary one. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. You can see a closed refrigerator in the room. You can make out a counter. The counter is usual. However, the counter, like an empty counter, has nothing on it. You scan the room, seeing a stove. But there isn't a thing on it. You can see a kitchen island. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? On the kitchen island you can see a note. There is a closed screen door leading east. There is an open wooden door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-1/6

admissible_commands: put old key on kitchen island

next_state: -= Backyard =- You find yourself in a backyard. An ordinary one. Let's see what's in here. You can see a set of chairs. The set of chairs is typical. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the set of chairs. You make out a bbq. The bbq is usual. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Hm. Oh well You can see a patio table. However, the patio table, like an empty patio table, has nothing on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it! There is an open screen door leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the south. > -= Backyard =-2/8
